definition: in short/in a word/in brief
always/to assemble/gather/total/overall/head/chief/general/in every case
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
words/speech/to say/to talk
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的[de5])/him/her/it

sentences.english: However, in a word, for the hard-working men, every minute is precious.
sentences.chinese: 但總而言之，對於忙碌工作的人，有時一刻就值千金。

sentences.english: All in all, Microsoft made some great improvements with the Active Directory Administrative Center.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，微軟在活動目錄管理中心中做了很多改進。

sentences.english: I' ll drink his health in honour of its being Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，城裏人喝酒時都舉杯祝她健康。

sentences.english: In one word, we must try our best to do the job.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，我們必須盡力去做這項工作。

sentences.english: In short, the Father never denied his Son any request.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，父神從來沒推卻祂兒子任何一個的祈求。

sentences.english: All in all, the human body consists of some thirty trillion cells!
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，人類身體擁有超過三千億的細胞。

sentences.english: To sum up, coeducation does more good than harm.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，男女合班利多於弊。

sentences.english: Anyway, people's life has changed a lot with inflated money-pockets.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，人們的錢袋還是鼓了，生活也隨着變美了。

sentences.english: All in all, for these hard-working men, sometimes one quarter-hour worthes thousands of gold.
sentences.chinese: 但總而言之，對於忙碌工作的人，有時一刻就值千金。

sentences.english: In sum, Drug Rehab must aim at rebuilding the life of the drug addict.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，藥物康復中心旨在恢復藥物成癮者的生活。

sentences.english: Overall their emphasis was on the character of Job, more than anything else.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，他們強調約伯要檢討自己，勝於其他一切。

sentences.english: In summary, the arguer fails to convince with the argument as presented.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，論述者沒能用其提出的論據來說服我們。

sentences.english: It' was a one-man business, anyhow.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，就是一個人的交易。

sentences.english: But in overall, Ayanami was a total mystery.
sentences.chinese: 然而總而言之，綾波是一個不折不扣的迷團。

sentences.english: In short, he tests his reasoning over and over again.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，他一遍又一遍不停地測試他的推理。

sentences.english: But overall, we have moved into a vicious cycle of niceness.
sentences.chinese: 但總而言之，我們已經進入美好事物的疊加循環中。

definition: in a word/in short/in brief
so-called/what is called
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
not necessarily/not likely
moreover/besides/in addition/furthermore
main point/essential
things like this (idiom); and so on/and the rest/etc
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
see 沒關係|没关系[mei2 guan1 xi5]
kind/type/class/category/similar/like/to resemble
no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
